subject: Figma welcome standee
description:
Figma welcome standee:
Figma team visiting for workshop on Friday, 7th August.
We need to create a welcome standee for the visiters,
description_text: Figma welcome standee: Figma team visiting for workshop on Friday, 7th August. We need to create a welcome standee for the visiters,

conversations.body: ​

conversations.body_text:
Hi Sahil,
I'm sharing the designs in the pdf along with copy options. I’ve taken
inspiration from our latest standee, and for the design visuals, I’ve
referred to some external figma refs that align well with the overall Figma
essence.

The attached PDF includes:
- Copy options
- Design references
- Design options

Please review and share your thoughts so we can finalize.

Thanks,
Priya

On Mon, Aug 4, 2025 at 5:13 PM Priya Saini <
support@paytm-designocl.freshdesk.com> wrote:

> ​
>
>
conversations.body:
Hi Sahil,
I'm sharing the designs in the pdf along with copy options. I’ve taken inspiration from our latest standee, and for the design visuals, I’ve referred to some external figma refs that align well with the overall Figma essence.

The attached PDF includes:
- Copy options
- Design references
- Design options

Please review and share your thoughts so we can finalize.

Thanks,
Priya

conversations.body_text:

We need to get a standee printed for Friday's event at skymark. Details
given below:

Paytm <3 figma standee
Size: 6x3ft
Quality : 2
Print file attached.

Pls help with the required process, Sahil will further lead it.

Thanks
